performances.description: Not one version of this on here? Bobby sings the dylan tune quite well. Deserves some votes.
This one does it for me. Highlight of this first set.
Otis, The best voice in the world sings Ballad Of A Thin Man
One of the best Dylan songs, played with alacrity. Dylan sneers and seethes, he actually enjoys singing this.

performances.venue: Autzen Stadium - University of Oregon Eugene, OR
performances.description: The Boys with Bob Dylan and they aint playin round
